400.description: Could happen when dispatching to a device that is offline, the user doesn't have permission or an incorrect command _type_ for the device

get.description: Without any params, returns a list of the user's devices

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: To fetch one or more devices. Multiple params can be passed like `id=31&id=42`

put.summary: Update the distance counter of the Device

post.summary: Link a Geofence to a Device

delete.summary: Remove a Geofence from a Device

get.description: Without any params, returns a list of the Groups the user belongs to

post.summary: Link a Geofence to a Group

delete.summary: Remove a Geofence from a Group

post.summary: Link a Device to a User

delete.summary: Remove a Device from a User

post.summary: Link a Group to a User

delete.summary: Remove a Group from a User

post.summary: Link a Geofence to a User

delete.summary: Remove a Geofence from a User

post.summary: Link a Calendar to a User

delete.summary: Remove a Calendar from a User

post.summary: Link a User to a manager User

delete.summary: Remove a User from a manager User

get.description: Without any params, it returns a list of last known positions for all the user's Devices. _from_ and _to_ fields are not required with _id_

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: _deviceId_ is optional, but requires the _from_ and _to_ parameters when used

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: To fetch one or more positions. Multiple params can be passed like `id=31&id=42`

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Can only be used by admin or manager users

get.summary: Fetch a list of Notification types
get.description: Without params, it returns a list of the user's enabled Notifications

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: To fetch a list of all available Notifications

get.summary: Fetch a list of available Commands for the Device

400.description: Could happen when trying to fetch from an offline device or the user does not have permission

get.description: Without params, it returns a list of Geofences the user has access to

get.summary: Fetch a list of Positions within the time period for the Devices or Groups
get.description: At least one _deviceId_ or one _groupId_ must be passed

get.summary: Fetch a list of Events within the time period for the Devices or Groups
get.description: At least one _deviceId_ or one _groupId_ must be passed

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: % can be used to return events of all types

get.summary: Fetch a list of ReportSummary within the time period for the Devices or Groups
get.description: At least one _deviceId_ or one _groupId_ must be passed

get.summary: Fetch a list of ReportTrips within the time period for the Devices or Groups
get.description: At least one _deviceId_ or one _groupId_ must be passed
Without params, it returns a list of AttributeAlias from all the user's Devices
Without params, it returns a list of Calendars the user has access to

all.name: all
all.description: Can only be used by admins or managers to fetch all entities

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Standard users can use this only with their own _userId_

deviceId.name: deviceId
deviceId.description: Standard users can use this only with _deviceId_s, they have access to
